title: New: Chelsea Burgin – Fall Weather
body:
Artwork by **[Laura-Lynn Petrick](http://www.flickr.com/photos/lauralynnpetrick/)**

As time goes on, I’m becoming increasingly more acceptant of, ‘not knowing’, when it comes to the artists I discover and grow to love. Columbus based artist **[Chelsea Burgin](http://soundcloud.com/tayblaru)** is such an artist. Apart from the fact she produces work in Columbus, the gang here at CITR know pretty much nothing, yet when this ignorance is set in parallel with her new track, **_Fall Weather_**, the lack of solid information seems little more than a frivolous attempt at some sort of explanation. The truth, with or without a story, is that the track is a real find. It loops on one central and dizzying loop, with the vocals spiraling into obsession, madness and sorrow.

With a whole wealth of work on her [Soundcloud](http://soundcloud.com/tayblaru), she really could be an artist you become consumed by.
